item.title: Delgocitinib Approved by FDA for Chronic Hand Eczema
item.description: The topical JAK inhibitor is the first treatment approved specifically for adults with moderate-to-severe chronic hand eczema. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Decline in Physical Activity Precedes Cardiovascular Events
item.description: Lifelong physical activity is vital for preventing chronic cardiovascular and metabolic diseases, a new study shows. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Lichen Sclerosus Tied to Higher Vulvar Cancer Risk
item.description: Medicare data show older women with vulvar lichen sclerosus are over 11 times more likely to develop vulvar squamous cell carcinoma or carcinoma in si...

item.title: After a Long Delay, ME/CFS Strategy Finally Arrives
item.description: The government has published its long-awaited plan for ME/CFS care, but patient groups warn it lacks the detail needed to deliver real change. Medscap...

item.title: Direct Primary Care Providers Get a Major Policy Win
item.description: Patients will be able to tap health savings account funds to pay for more personalized medicine. Medscape Medical News
